frontmatter.title: Building Scalable APIs with AWS API Gateway
frontmatter.description: There is a lot of excitement around serverless architecture and it is for a good reason, abstracting the tedious details of configuration and management of your architecture can make a lot of sense for the right application, the AWS API gateway is one of the several tools that allow you this.
